mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PRODUCT_ITEM (ID, NAME, IMAGE_PATH, INFO, TYPE_ID, SKU, SOURCE, RELEASE_TIME, ACCOUNT, ORDERITEMID, TYPE_PID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, P_STATE, PRICE, CREATE_USER_ID, MAIN_PATH ) VALUES (seq_product_id.nextval, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typePid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_DATE, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, 1, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createUserID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PRODUCT_ITEM a SET P_STATE=#{pState},UPDATE_TIME=CURRENT_DATE,STATE_TIME=CURRENT_DATE WHERE ID=#{id}
UPDATE T_PRODUCT_ITEM a SET STATUS=1,UPDATE_TIME=CURRENT_DATE WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.l_c_name typeName FROM T_PRODUCT_ITEM a LEFT JOIN T_PRODUCT_TYPE_LOCAL b ON a.type_id = b.l_c_id where a.ID=#{id}
